name: Beat Bounce (prbsth, DisplayVj, Darren Thibodeau, ToscaniniandtheBasses, wospy)
name_original: Beat Bounce (prbsth, DisplayVj, Darren Thibodeau, ToscaniniandtheBasses, wospy)
description:
You are Mr. X, a Bouncer at the club “Bahama Mama”. But you’re no ordinary bouncer, you have a rare genetic condition called a Dance Fever. Your body craves dancing, your heart stops beating if you go a few seconds without dancing. However, you must also do your job and kick the party guests, who are causing trouble, out of the club! Don’t spend too much time doing your job, because then you might die, but don't spend all the time dancing, because then you might lose your job!

CONTROLS:
WSAD and Arrow keys to Move
Press "Space" to dance
Press "E" to kick troublemakers off the dance floor
Press play to start playing the best game ever!

CREDITS: 
MATAN - DEVELOPER AND ARTIST
KRISHNA SUDHAN - MUSIC COMPOSER
PURAB SETH - DEVELOPER AND DESIGNER
VIJAY KUMAR - DESIGNER
DARREN THIBODEAU - ARTIST
